title: No No Yes Yes
description: YES! This must-have toddler title sheds light on some concepts with a comical flair.Yanking cat by no NO. Gentle pat on yes YES. And it’s funny how dumping a bowl of food gets a very different reaction from mastering the use of a spoon. An expressive baby demonstrates familiar behaviors — and their predictable responses — in an amusing board book that merits a giant YES!
author: Leslie Patricelli
